articles.description: The 37-year-old forward will appear at his fifth World Cup this winter after two goals from Manchester United team-mate Bruno Fernandes secured the Selecao's place in Qatar.
articles.content:
Cristiano Ronaldo insists Portugal are not satisfied simply with qualifying for the 2022 World Cup and will aim for 'so much more' at the finals this winter.

articles.title: Rory McIlroy: Former world number one tees up in Texas before Masters challenge - BBC
articles.description: Rory McIlroy hopes playing in the Texas Open will be the ideal preparation for his eighth attempt at achieving the career grand slam next week.
articles.content:
McIlroy has opted not to compete in the week before the Masters over the last seven years
